feed.title: Google Cloud: App Engine standard environment PHP
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: App Engine standard environment PHP

entry.title: Feature
entry.content: Support for the [PHP 8.4 runtime](https://cloud.google.com/appengine/docs/standard/php-gen2/runtime) is in [General Availability (GA)](https://cloud.google.com/products/#product-launch-stages).
